description:
Serializes a request body for creating a new user. Do not use for returning user
data as the password will be returned also.

is_active.title: Active
is_active.description: Designates whether this user should be treated as active. Set this to false instead of deleting accounts.

is_staff.title: Staff status
is_staff.description: Designates whether this user is an admin and has access to all workspaces and Baserow's admin areas.
